name: Shadow Thread
desc:
Pitch-black thread winds around a target creature in range that you can see, who must make a
Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they become bound (can't use AP to attack or cast non-Still
spells) for the duration.
The spell ends automatically if the creature moves out of range. The creature can spend 2 AP to
make a Strength saving throw, breaking free on a success.
empower:
The spell no longer ends automatically when the creature moves out of range. AP
cost to attempt a save increases to 3.
author: CrusaderDroid
